title: MAFS' Ines Basic debuts new bangs after hair makeover
text:
She's the Married At First Sight star who recently launched her career as an Instagram model.

And on Friday, Ines Basic took to the platform to debut her new hair to her 161,000 followers.

The reality TV star, 29, shared a video showing off her bangs and layered cut shortly after completing the transformation.

She's bangin! MAFS' Ines Basic (pictured) has debuted her new fringe after undergoing a hair transformation

'You know a chicks about to raise hell when she gets a whole new hair vibe,' she captioned the post.

'Obsessed would be an understatement!,' she wrote.

In the video, Ines can be seen playing with her hair while turning to different angles to give fans a complete view of her transformation.

New look: Taking to Instagram, Ines shared a video showing off her bangs and layered haircut shortly after completing the transformation

During her stint on Married At First Sight, she was known for always styling hair hair in a tight ponytail.

Ines' post comes four months after she claimed that she never has to work again due to her success as an Instagram influencer.

Speaking the Herald Sun in June, she bragged: 'I don't need to [work].'

Signature style: During her stint on Married At First Sight, she was known for always styling hair hair in a tight ponytail

Blushing bride: Even on her wedding day, the villainous bride pinned her hair back

'I will probably never have to go back to a 9-5 job,' she continued, confirming that she'd quit her pre-fame job as a legal assistant.

'Instagram is huge, the power of Instagram is so massive... I just want to work for myself.'

She regularly flogs products to her followers, spruiking everything from face creams and clothing to double-sided breast tape.

Her former Married At First Sight co-stars Martha Kalifatidis and Jessika Power have also become professional Instagram models.
description: She's the Married At First Sight star who recently launched her career as an Instagram model.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
